Rafael is very grateful to the Kiva lenders because with their help he'll be able to buy school supplies such as books, notebooks, uniforms, and other things, because the school year begins soon in the city.  This way his children will have the materials they need to be able to go to school without any problem.

He's going to continue striving to be able to get ahead and continue saving to realize his big dream: "To give his children an education and a mini-market."

loans.use: to buy school supplies

loans.name: Alle

texts.fr:
Alle agé de 36 ans abite dans le sud sénégal depuis 20ans il est dans le couture,avec ce crédit ,il achéte une machine 20u pour modérer ses coutures et élargire son atelier de travail .
Alle avec son métier de couture ,il supporte les dépenses de sa famille composée d'une femme et 1 petit garçon de 2ans qui est dans le jardin d'anfents et paye la location de sa chambre et son atelier.Il ambitionne avoir son propre terrain dan la ville.Il remerci l'u imcec et kiva
texts.en: Alle is 36 years old and lives in southern Senegal. He has been a tailor for 20 years. With this loan, he will buy a 20u sewing machine, so that he can control his stitching and enlarge his workshop. Thanks to his job as a tailor, he is able to cover the expenses of his family - which is made up of a woman and a small boy aged 2, who is in kindergarten - and pay the rent for his room and his workshop. He aims to have his own land in town. He thanks UIMCEC and Kiva.

loans.use: to buy a sewing machine (20u).

loans.name: Mayra

texts.es:
Mayra, 45 años de edad, madre de tres hijos de 20,18 y 11 años de edad respectivamente, habitante de Condega municipio de Estelí, se dedica atender un pequeño molino. Negocio que inicio hace 11 años pues necesitaba generar ingresos para poner a sus hijos a estudiar los ingresos de su esposo no eran suficientes así que fue una buena opción brindar el servicio de molino en su comunidad. Se ha convertido es su medio de subsistencia y con el cual mantiene a su familia.
Está necesitando el financiamiento para comprar coladores de harina, esto le permitirá moler productos secos tales como cereales, maíz y trigo. 
Uno de sus planes a futuro que le gustaría realizar es poner piso a su negocio ya que actualmente donde esta es de tierra y poner otro molino en otra comunidad.
texts.en:
Mayra is a 45-year old woman and mother of three children, aged 20, 18 and 11 years old. She lives in Condega, Estelí and works at her small mill, a business that she started 11 years ago to earn income towards her children's education. Her husband's income was not sufficient, so it was a good opportunity to bring a mill service to her community. This has become her way of making a living and her means to support her family. 

She needs financing to buy flour strainers. This will allow her to mill dry products, such as cereals, corn and wheat. One of her plans for the future is to put a floor at her business, which is currently on the ground, and to set up another mill in a different community.

loans.use: to buy flour strainers.

loans.name: Ivania De Los Angeles

texts.es: La señora Ivania habita en el municipo de Ticuantepe,  casada madre de hijos, ella labora para una empresa privada al igual su esposo quien le apoya en todas las decisiones, con mucho esfuerzo trabajan mucho para lograr cumplir su mayor sueño terminar su casa, con este credito compra materiales  para empezar a construir lo que por momento estaba estancado por  falta de dinero, Agradece a Afodenic y fondos Kiva por la oportunidad  que le estan brindado con este credito.
texts.en: Ivania lives in the municipality of Ticuantepe. She is married and the mother of children. She works for a private business, as well as her husband, whom she supports in all the decisions. With great effort, they work a lot to be able realize their greatest dream of finishing their home. With this loan, she will purchase materials to begin construction, which, for the moment, is at a stand still due to lack of money. She is grateful to Kiva partner Afodenic and Kiva funds for the opportunity that they are giving her with this loan.

loans.use: purchase construction materials

loans.name: Maria Alejandrina

texts.es:
Maria tiene 47 años de edad, tiene 3 hijos los cuales ha criado sola con mucho esfuerzo y sacrificio pero por lo cual ella está muy orgullosa, Maria vive en la ciudad de Chincha, la cual se caracteriza por su clima cálido y acogedor, así como también playas hermosas y   Maria es una mujer humildad de muy buen carácter y sobre todo una madre muy luchadora ya que cada día busca la manera de mejorar y sacar adelante a su familia.

Maria trabaja en su negocio de venta de comida y bebidas gaseosas y cervezas, en un día puede atender hasta 20 clientes en el día, ella cree que le va bien en su negocio porque atiende muy bien a los clientes ya que le gusta que las personas hablen del buen trato que ella brinda y así mas clientes vienen a buscarla para comprar sus productos, pero también porque Dios la protege y la ayuda a hacer las cosas con honradez y respeto a los demás.

Maria está muy agradecida con los prestamistas Kiva ya que con su ayuda ella podrá comprar útiles escolares ya que esta pronto el inicio de las clases en los colegios, de la ciudad y de esta manera sus hijos tendrán los materiales necesarios para poder ir a la escuela sin inconvenientes, así seguirá luchando para poder seguir saliendo adelante y poder seguir ahorrando para cumplir su gran sueño:” Darle una profesión a sus hijos y tener un mejor local para su negocio “Tener su Casa propia”.
texts.en:
Maria is 47 years of age. She has three children whom she has raised alone, with great effort and sacrifice, but she is very proud of them. Maria lives in the city of Chincha, which is characterised by its warm climate as well as its beautiful beaches. Maria is a humble woman of good character and above all a determined mother who every day seeks a way to help her family's situation and to help them to get ahead.

Maria works in her business selling food and soft drinks and beers. In one day she can serve up to 20 customers. She believes that her business is going well because she takes good care of her customers, as she likes people to speak of the good service she gives, so more customers seek to buy her products, but also because God protects her and helps her to do things with honesty and respect for others. 

Maria is very grateful to the Kiva lenders as with their help she will be able to buy school supplies, as the classes in the schools in the city will begin soon. This way her children will have the necessary materials to be able to go to school without problems. In this way she will continue fighting to be able to continue to advance herself and to keep saving to achieve her big dream: "To give her children a chance at a profession and to have a better location for her business. To have her own home."

loans.use: to buy school supplies.

loans.name: Luz De La Esperanza Group

texts.es: Este es el grupo “Luz De La Esperanza” con 07 integrantes la cual pasan a su 6to ciclo, que en el transcurso del tiempo han demostrado responsabilidad y  compañerismo. Olga la tesorera del grupo es casada con 02 la cual sigue apoyando a 01 de ellos. Hace más de 10 años que se dedica a la venta de golosinas, la cual lo realiza ambulatoriamente, siendo la gran mayoría de sus clientes personas que viajan al centro del país. Se siente feliz pues a podido ayudar a sus hijos con sus estudios. Su último crédito lo destinará para la compra de golosinas, confiterías y bebidas. Su mayor deseo es de comprarse un  carro la cual lo brinde como servicio de transporte. El grupo “Luz De La Esperanza” agradecen el crédito brindado ya que hace posible su progreso. Olga se encuentra sentada es la primera del derecho.
texts.en:
This is the communal bank "Luz De La Esperanza", formed by 7 members. They are in their sixth loan cycle and over the time they have shown responsibility and comradeship. 
Olga is the treasurer of the group. She is married and has two children, one of whom she still supports. She has been selling candy as a street vendor for over 10 years. Most of her customers are people that travel to the center of the country. She is happy to have managed to help her children with their studies. 
She will use her latest loan to purchase candy, confectionery goods and sodas. Her biggest wish is to buy a car to provide transportation services.
The "Luz De La Esperanza" communal bank is grateful for the loan that enables them to progress. Olga is the first woman sitting on the front row starting from the right.

loans.use: To purchase sweets, confectionery goods and sodas.

loans.name: Marta Patricia

texts.es:
Marta, 44 años de edad, originaria de Estelí, soltera, madre de 2 hijo entre 12 y 13 años respectivamente, ella solo logro finalizar su quinto año de secundaria, de oficio comerciante, se dedica a la elaboración y venta de tortillas y a la misma vez es dueña de una pulpería. Desde muy joven ha trabajado para sustentar a la familia, ya que con mucho esfuerzo y arduo trabajo ha podido salir adelante, se siente muy satisfecha porque su negocio le genera ganancias a diarias, cuenta con clientes fijos, de esta manera ella pudo emprender su otro negocio como es su pequeña pulpería, de la cual también obtiene ingresos extras. Sus expectativas es seguir vendiendo más para satisfacer las necesidades de su clientela. 
Ella está requiriendo el financiamiento para comprar leña, maíz, y granos básicos como arroz, azúcar, frijoles, pan y aceite, etc. Ya que ella estima que este crédito le ayudara a comprar todos los productos que aún no tiene en existencia, con el objetivo de incrementar sus ventas cada día más y mejorar los ingresos para su hogar.
texts.en:
Marta is 44 years old. She comes from Estelí. She is a single mother of two children, aged 12 and 13. She only managed to finish 5th grade. She works as a shop-keeper.  She makes and sells tortillas and also owns a small grocery store. She has worked from a very young age to provide for her family, and with a lot of effort and hard work she has managed to get by. She is very satisfied because her tortilla business generates daily profits and she has regular customers. This enabled her to start a new business with her grocery store, which also generates additional income.
She hopes to keep selling to meet the demands of her customers.
She is asking for this loan to purchase firewood, corn and basic grains such as rice and also sugar, beans, bread, oil, etc. She considers that this loan will help her to buy all the merchandise that she still doesn't have in stock, with the purpose of increasing her sales every day and of improving her household income.

loans.use: to purchase firewood, corn and basic grains such as rice, sugar, beans, bread, oil, etc.

loans.name: Xiomara Janeth

texts.es: Xiomara, 32 años de edad, es una  humilde comerciante quien se dedica al negocio de pulpería, es clienta Kiva, ella nos cuenta que su primer crédito le fue de gran ayuda porque le permitió comprar más mercadería y hacer crecer su negocio con productos que aún no tenia en inventario como azúcar, frijoles, cosméticos y ropa interior, con el propósito de obtener mejores ingresos y poder seguir creciendo en su negocio. Ella está necesitando financiamiento para comprar granos básicos como azúcar, arroz, aceite, pan, cloro, etc. Con el objetivo de seguir surtiendo de nuevos productos su pulpería y cumplir con la demanda de su clientela.
texts.en: Xiomara is 32 years old.  She a humble businesswoman who works as a grocer.  She is a Kiva client.  She tells us that her first loan was a great help because it allowed her to make her business grow by buying more products that she still didn't have in her inventory like sugar, beans, cosmetics and underwear  The goal was to obtain a better income and to be able to continue growing her business.  She needs financing to buy basic items such as sugar, rice, oil, bread, bleach, etc.  The goal is to continue supplying her store with new products and to keep up with customer demand.

loans.use: to buy basic items such as sugar, rice, oil, bread, bleach, etc.

loans.name: Ángel José

texts.es:
Ángel de 43 años de edad, sabe como ganarse el pan diario y ofrecerle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida. Su fuerte siempre ha sido el sector comercial, por lo cual desde hace 23 años se dedica a la venta de fruta y comestibles en una pequeña caseta ubicada en el parque principal del municipio de Santa Fe de Antioquia, Colombia.
Su producto de mayor venta es el tamarindo, con el cual se ha dado a conocer en su localidad. Nativos y extranjeros visitan su negocio para llevar esta exótica fruta.
Una de sus mayores dificultades es la compra de la fruta, debido a que por ser un producto no tradicional y su cosecha es por temporada el costo suele elevarse, ocasionándole reducción en su rentabilidad. 
A pesar de las dificultades ocasionadas por los precios, don Ángel, cuenta que gracias a su actividad ha podido mejorar sus condiciones de vida. Hoy desea expandir su negocio y realizar mejoras locativas. Para cumplir con sus metas se encuentra solicitando un crédito que invertirá en la compra de tamarindo con el fin de aumentar sus ventas y generar mayores ingresos que le permitirán ir en búsqueda de la construcción de sus sueños.
texts.en:
Ángel, 43, knows how to earn his daily bread and offer his family the best quality of life. His strength has always been the commercial sector, which is why, for 23 years, he has been selling fruit and groceries in a small stand located in the main park of the Santa Fe municipality of Antioquia, Colombia.

His best-selling product is tamarind fruit, by which he has become well-known in his area. Natives and foreigners visit his business to take home this exotic fruit. One of his biggest challenges is buying the fruit. Because it is a non-traditional product and its harvest is seasonal, the cost tends to rise, which causes a reduction in his profitability. 

In spite of the difficulties caused by prices, Ángel states that thanks to his business he has been able to improve his life's conditions. Today he wishes to expand his business and make improvements to his business premises.

To meet his goals, he is requesting a loan to be invested in the purchase of tamarind fruit with the purpose of increasing his sales and generating a greater income which will allow him to go in search of the structure of his dreams.

loans.use: to buy tamarind fruit

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy parts to repair bicycles

loans.name: Gladys María

texts.es:
Gladys de 42 años, es una mujer que ha luchado incansablemente por salir adelante con sus tres hijos de los cuales dos son menores de edad. Por ser madre soltera le ha tocado correr con los gastos de su hogar y luchar por el bienestar y la educación de sus hijos. 
Se dedica a la sastrería, oficio que aprendió gracias a su madre. Labora diariamente de 8 de la mañana a 6 de la tarde realizando arreglos y vestuarios a sus vecinos. 
Su mayor sueño es poder crear una empresa dedicada a la confección de terceros con el fin de mejorar su situación económica y generación de una nueva fuente de empleo para mujeres cabeza de familia. Con el propósito de alcanzar su sueño Gladys, se encuentra solicitando un crédito que invertirá en la compra de una máquina ojaladora e insumos para mejorar la calidad en el servicio y generar mayores ingresos para garantizarle a sus de sus hijos mejores condiciones de vida.
texts.en:
Gladys, 42 years old, is a woman who has fought tirelessly to succeed and move forward with her three children, who are all minors. Because she is a single mother, she has had to handle the household expenses and fight for the well being and education of her children.

She works in sewing, a trade that she learned thanks to her mother. She works every day from 8 am to 6 pm, making repairs and outfits for her neighbors.

Her greatest dream is to be able to create a business dedicated to making (clothes) for others with the goal of improving her economic situation and creating a new source of employment for women who are the head of their families. In order to realize her dream, Gladys finds herself requesting a loan that she will invest in purchasing a sewing machine that makes buttonholes, as well as purchase supplies to improve the quality of her service and generate better income to guarantee her children a better quality of life.

loans.use: purchase a sewing machine to make buttonholes as well as purchase supplies (fabrics)

loans.name: Jose Humberto

texts.es: El señor Humberto, hombre trabajador, junto a su esposa e hijos  lucha dia a dia para lograr cumplir su sueño terminar su casa, y mejorar sus condiciones de vida. con este credito que Afodenic y Fondos Kiva le han brindado comprara los materiales necesarios para construir parte de este sueño. Agradece mucho la confianza que se le ha brindado estos años.
texts.en: Humberto is a hardworking man. He works hard every day with his wife and children to fulfill his dream of finishing his house and improving their living conditions. With the loan that Afrodenic and Kiva have given him, he will purchase the materials necessary to build part of his dream. He is very grateful for the trust place in him over the years.

loans.use: purchase construction materials.

loans.name: Juan Camilo

texts.es:
Juan Camilo a sus 19 años de edad, ya se proyecta como un gran empresario, o por lo menos a si lo considera su ex-jefe quien al ver potencial en este joven decidió impulsarlo y prestarle el capital inicial para que montara su propio negocio. Desde hace nueve meses labora como independiente desde su vivienda, comercializando refrescos y mecatos. Asegura que esta ha sido la mejor oportunidad que le ha regalado la vida porque ha podido aprender acerca del servicio al cliente y a manejar las finanzas.
Desea seguir creciendo a nivel personal y profesional, por lo cual comenzará a estudiar mercadeo para expandir su negocio. 
Su mayor dificultad es la falta de capital, por lo cual se encuentra se encuentra solicitando un crédito que invertirá en la compra de surtido a fin de satisfacer las necesidades de sus clientes y mejorar sus ingresos. 
Su familia es su mayor tesoro por lo cual está dispuesto a esforzarse para brindarle a sus hermanos una buena educación y a su madre una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Juan Camilo, at the age of 19 years, already shines as a great businessman, or at least, his ex-boss thinks of him that way. On seeing potential in this young man, he decided to inspire him and loan him the initial capital to start his own business. For nine months, Juan has worked independently from his home, selling beverages and pastries. He says that this has been the best opportunity that life has given him because he has been able to learn about customer service and how to manage finances.

He wants to continue growing on personal and professional levels, so he will start studying marketing to expand his business.

His main challenge is lack of capital, so he finds himself requesting a loan that he will invest in the purchase of stock to meet his customers' needs and improve his revenues.

His family is his greatest treasure, which is why he is prepared to exert himself to give his siblings a good education and his mother a better quality of life.

loans.use: purchase beverages and pastries

loans.name: Elizabeth

texts.es: La señora Elizabeth, habita en el Km 17 carretera Masaya, junto a su esposo e hijos, quienes la apoyan en todas sus decisones, su esposo labora para una empresa privada al igaul que ella. con este credito que se le ha otrogado Doña Elizabeth podra comprar Materiales para continuar con la construccion de su casa. Bloques, Cemento, Arena, Hierro etc. Agradece el apoyo que Afodenic y Fondos Kiva le han brindado .
texts.en:
Elizabeth lives at Kilometer 17 of the Masaya highway with her husband and children. Her family is supportive of her in all of her decisions. She and her husband both work for a private company. 

With this loan Elizabeth will be able to buy materials to continue the construction of her house. This includes blocks, cement, sand, and iron etc. 

She is thankful for the support given to her by Afodenic and Kiva.

loans.use: to buy construction materials.

loans.name: Nubia

texts.es:
Nubia de 44 años de edad, es una mujer a la que le ha tocado asumir riesgos y afrontar retos para mejorar su calidad de vida. Desde hace ocho años se dedica a la venta de productos por catálogo, después de quedarse sin empleo en la empresa en donde laboró por más de 15 años. Llena de necesidades y obligaciones y con pocas oportunidades en el campo laboral debido a su nivel educativo, Nubia decidió emprender su propio negocio. 
Asegura que aunque las ventas a veces son duras y existan clientes irresponsables que no cancelan sus deudas, esta actividad le ha permitido sostenerse y tener una buena calidad de vida. 
Su mayor sueño es poder ampliar su negocio y adecuar un local para vender sus productos de manera formal; convencida de que los sueños se hacen realidad, esta mujer se encuentra solicitando un crédito que invertirá en la compra de mercancía al por mayor que le permitirá aumentar sus ventas y con ello ahorrar para montar su almacén.
texts.en:
Nubia is 44 years old. She is a woman that has had to take risks and face challenges in order to improve her quality of life. For the past eight years she has earned a living selling products by catalogue. Nubia was left unemployed after working for a company for more than 15 years. Having many needs and obligations and with few opportunities to find work because of her level of education, Nubia decided to start her own business.

Although making sales can be difficult, and sometimes irresponsible clients do not pay their bills, this job allows Nubia to support herself and enjoy a good quality of life.

Her dream is to be able to expand her business and establish a formal store to sell her products. Convinced that dreams can come true, Nubia is requesting a loan to buy merchandise in bulk. This will allow her to increase her sales and save money to establish a store.

loans.use: to buy catalogue products in bulk.

loans.name: Olga Lucía

texts.es:
“Los hijos siempre serán la mayor bendición que Dios pueda regalarnos en esta tierra” Con esta frase, Olga de 37 años de edad, manifiesta cual es su mayor motivo para laborar fuertemente. Debido a la circunstancias de la vida es madre soltera de tres hijos menores de edad, pero eso no le preocupa. Mira adelante con optimismo y agrace la oportunidad que la vida le dio al laborar en varias empresas del sector de confecciones y aprender lo que hoy le ha permitido generar el sustento para su familia y ofrecerle un mejor presente y futuro a sus hijos. 

Su mayor sueño es adquirir una máquina plana con el fin de incrementar su producción. Debido a que carece de los recursos económicos para esta adquisición, se encuentra solicitando un crédito.
Espera poder mejorar su calidad de vida y garantizarles a sus hijos educación de calidad.
texts.en:
“Children will always be the biggest blessing that God can grant us on this earth". With this sentence, 37-year-old Olga demonstrates her greatest reason to work hard. Due to her life's circumstances she is a single mother of three minor children, but that does not worry her. 

She looks forward with optimism and appreciates the opportunity that life gave her to work in various businesses in the apparel sector and learn what today has allowed her to generate a livelihood for her family and offer her children a better present and future.

Her greatest dream is to acquire a tabletop sewing machine so that she can increase her production. Because she lacks the economic resources to acquire this, she is requesting a loan. 

She hopes to be able to improve her quality of life and guarantee her children a quality education.

loans.use: to buy a tabletop sewing machine

loans.name: Teresa De La Concepcion

texts.es:
Teresa, de 56 años de edad, madre 2 hijos, originaria de la ciudad de León, se dedica al comercio desde hace 15 años. Inicio vendiendo muy pocas piezas de artesanías tales como carteras, camisas, pulseras, jarros de barro, poco a poco fue introduciendo más variedad, ella dice que sus precios justos fue lo que ayudo a que sus ventas fueran buenas así mismo aprendió que tipo de articulo era lo que más buscaban sus clientela. Este ha sido su único negocio del cual ha mantenido a su familia. Le gustaría exportar sus piezas artesanales fuera del país, dar a conocer en Panamá y Centroamérica. Su expectativa es poner otro tramo en la cual solo venda ropa tradicional propia de la cultura. 
Ella está requiriendo el crédito para comprar mercadería tales como jarrones, ollas, bolsos y piezas artesanales de barro y madera.
texts.en:
Teresa, 56, is the mother of two children and a native of the city of León.  She has made a living as a merchant for 15 years.

She started selling a few handcrafted pieces such as wallets, shirts, bracelets, and clay pitchers.  Little by little she started introducing more variety.  She says her fair prices were what helped her have good sales.  She also learned what types of articles her customers looked for most.  This has been the only business with which she has supported her family.

She would like to export her handicraft works outside the country, make them known in Panama and Central America.  Her hope is to set up another section where she only sells traditional clothing from the local agriculture.

She needs the loan to buy merchandise such as pitchers, pots, bags, and handcrafted pieces made of clay and wood.

loans.use: to buy handcrafted merchandise

loans.name: Ruth

texts.es:
Rut de 49 años, es madre de dos hijos menores de edad. Ama su familia y considera que ellos son el motor que la impulsa diariamente a esforzarse para brindarles mejores oportunidades y garantizarles una buena educación. 
Desde hace tres años decidió montar su propio negocio, dedicado a la venta de papelería en el cual labora diariamente de 9 de la mañana a 6 de la tarde. Con el fin de poder compartir más tiempo con su familia. Ama lo que hace y agradece a Dios la oportunidad de que le ha dado de generar sus propios ingresos. Hoy desea poder mejorar el surtido de su negocio, por lo cual se encuentra solicitando un crédito que destinará para la compra de papelería a fin de satisfacer las necesidades de sus clientes.

Su mayor sueño es poder pagarles a sus hijos estudios universitarios porque considera que será el mejor regalo que puede entregarles.
texts.en:
Rut, 49, is the mother of two minor children. She loves her family and considers them to be the motor that propels her daily to make the effort to offer them better opportunities and guarantee them a good education.

Three years ago she decided to set up her own business, dedicated to selling stationary. She works daily from 9 in the morning until 6 in the afternoon with the purpose of being able to share more time with her family. She loves what she does and thanks God for the opportunity that he has given her, that of being able to generate her own income. 

Today she wishes to be able to improve the selection at her business, which is why she is requesting a loan that she will use to buy stationery so she can satisfy the needs of her clients. 

Her biggest dream is to be able to pay for her children's university studies because she believes that will be the best gift she can give them.

loans.use: to buy stationery

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: perform general maintenance and purchase tires for his mototaxi.

loans.name: Francisca Haydde

texts.es: Francisca, de 67 años de edad, habitante de la ciudad de León, madre de 5 hijos, se dedica a la venta de refrescos naturales.  Esta agradecida por darle la oportunidad que le dio Kiva al financiar su crédito el cual utilizo para comprar frutas y especies para elaborar refrescos naturales. Como mujer emprendedora que desea salir adelante cada día quiere conseguir otras formas de ingresos que le ayuden alcanzar su meta de mejorar la infraestructura de su negocio es por ese motivo que requiere este financiamiento para comprar platos, cucharas, vasos, tenedores, cucharas de melanina para vender. Pues desea poco a poco invertir sus ganancias en otro tipo de negocios que le permitan conseguir ingresos y no solo dedicarse a vender sus refrescos.
texts.en: 67-year-old Francisca lives in the city of León and is the mother of five children.  Her business is selling soft drinks made from natural ingredients.  She is grateful for the opportunity she received from Kiva through her previous loan which she used to buy fruit and spices to make her natural drinks.  As an entrepreneurial woman who strives to continue making progress every day, Francisca would like to gain other sources of income which will help her to achieve her goal of improving the infrastructure of her business.  She needs this loan to buy dishes, spoons, glasses, and melamine forks and spoons to sell.  She would like to gradually invest her profits in another type of income-generating business so that she has something else besides selling her soft drinks.

loans.use: to buy dishes, spoons, glasses, and melamine forks and spoons

loans.name: Luz Marina

texts.es:
Luz Marina de 51 años de edad, es separada y madre de tres hijos, por los cuales ha tenido que esforzarse a fin de sacarlos adelante y garantizarles un mejor futuro.
Cuando se separó de su cónyuge le tocó hacerse cargo de las obligaciones del hogar, así que distribuyó su tiempo entre el cuidado de sus hijos y la búsqueda de ingresos para sostenerlos.
Por iniciativa de un amigo, Luz Marina, comenzó su negocio en sociedad,  dedicado a la fabricación de mueblería. Actividad que dio buenos resultados y  a la cual se dedica desde hace 20 años. Manifiesta estar satisfecha con su trabajo porque lo considera un arte. Actualmente labora con 2 empleados de lunes a sábado de ocho de la mañana a ocho de la noche.
En la actualidad se encuentra solicitando un crédito que invertirá en la compra de materiales e insumos para la fabricación de muebles, espera poder mejorar su productividad y poder hacer entrega de los pedidos solicitados, con el fin de incrementar sus ingresos y mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia.
texts.en:
Luz Marina is 51 years old. She is separated and has 3 children who she strives to provide for and ensure a better future.
When she separated from her spouse she took on all the household responsibilities and has had to divide her time between caring for her children and financially providing for them.
At a friend’s suggestion, Luz Marina started a furniture making business 20 years ago which has been very successful.  She is satisfied with this work because she considers it an art. Currently, she has 2 employees with whom she works Monday through Saturday from eight in the morning until eight at night. 
She is requesting a loan to purchase furniture making supplies and materials. She hopes to be able to increase her productivity and fill her orders so that she can increase her income and improve her family’s quality of life.

loans.use: purchase materials such as wood, glue and sandpaper.

loans.name: Nelly Esther

texts.es:
Nelly tiene  58 años de edad, es una mujer con un espíritu muy alegre y sobre todo que ella nos comenta que tendrá 58 años pero su espíritu es de una joven de solo 20 porque los años pasan pero la alegría y las ganas de vivir siempre deben ser como la un joven. Su vivienda de Nelly se encuentra en la linda ciudad de Pisco, ciudad que se caracteriza por su agricultura, la pesca, por sus atractivos turísticos como son las Islas Ballestas y el candelabro de Paracas, también posee playas hermosas y sobre todo se caracteriza por la generosidad de sus pobladores. Nelly es muy hábil con los palillo de tejer por ello cuando dispone de un tiempito libre le gusta mucho tejer sobre todo chompas, chalinas, entre otros, asimismo le gusta cocinar uno de sus platillos favoritos el cual es el riquísimo “Arroz con Pato”. Debido a los pocos recursos económicos de sus padres Nelly solo tuvo estudios secundarios, pero le hubiera gustado mucho estudiar Enfermería.

Día a día y desde muy tempranito Nelly se levanta para ir a trabajar en su negocio de venta de flores, trabaja alrededor de 10 horas al día y puede atender hasta 30 clientes en el día, siempre tiene un carácter muy amable y por ello ella cree que le va bien en su negocio porque los clientes siempre salen contentos y también porque es muy honrada y muy creativa para hacer sus arreglos.

Nelly está muy feliz y muy agradecida con la ayuda brindada por los prestatarios Kiva ya que es la segunda vez que le dan su valioso apoyo podrá comprar más mercadería para su negocio como flores en fardos, especialmente rosas, claveles, gladiolos, entre otros ya que en cada fardo vienen muchas variedades de flores, con ello mejoraría sus ingresos y tendría más variedad de flores en especial porque se acerca el día del padre y en esta época aumentan los clientes, así ella seguirá trabajando con esa alegría y esas ganas que la caracterizan para así poder luchar por hacer realidad su más grande sueño:” Construir su vivienda de material noble y tener otro puesto de venta de flores”.
texts.en:
Nelly is 58 years old and is a spirited, very happy woman.  More than anything, she has told us that even though he is 58 years old, she has the spirit of a 20-year-old.  She believes that despite the passage of time, one's happiness and the will to live should always be that of a young person.

Nelly's home is in the beautiful city of Pisco, which is known for farming, fishing, and tourist attractions such as the Ballestas Islands and the Paracas Candelabra.  In addition, it has gorgeous beaches and above all is known for the generosity of its residents.

Nelly is very good at knitting.  When she has free time she loves more than anything to knit sweaters, scarves, etc.  Likewise, she likes to cook one of her favorite dishes: the delicious "Arroz con Pato" (rice with duck).  Due to her parents' limited financial resources, Nelly only went to school up to secondary school, but she would liked to have studied nursing.

Every day for a long time, Nelly gets up to work at her flower-selling business.  She works about 10 hours a day and can have up to 30 customers a day.  She always has a friendly personality and she believes this is why that her business is going well for her.  Her customers always leave satisfied.  In addition, she owes her success to being very honest and very creative in making her flower arrangements.

Nelly is very happy and grateful for the help offered by Kiva lenders, since this is the second time that they are giving their valuable support.  She will be able to buy more merchandise for her business, including flower bouquets, especially roses, carnations, gladioli, among others (since in every arrangement there is a great variety of flowers).  With this, she would improve her income and have a greater variety of flowers (especially since Fathers' Day is coming up and she gets more customers during this time).

In this way, she will continue working with that happiness and desire that define her so she can be able to strive to make her greatest dream a reality: building her house with high-quality materials and having another stand for her flower sales.

loans.use: buy bouquets of flowers.

loans.name: Fernando Favio

texts.es:
Fernando, vive en la ciudad de Camaná; ciudad que se caracteriza por ciudad que se caracteriza por su agricultura, en especial por el cultivo del Arroz, el cual es muy conocido a nivel internacional, así como también se le conoce por sus hermosas playas y la generosidad de sus pobladores. Es padre de 2 hijos de 5 y 8 años a los cuales ama muchísimo y por los cuales se esfuerza mucho por sacarlos adelante y que tengan una vida feliz y sin penuria; en su tiempo libre a Fernando le gusta jugar futbol con sus vecinos, así como también comer uno de sus platos favoritos los riquísimos “frejoles”.

Con mucho esfuerzo Fernando trabaja en su negocio como maestro constructor, labora alrededor de 12 horas al día, pero depende del tamaño de la construcción que realice, el cree que le va bien en su negocio porque es muy responsable y honrado con los clientes por ello le tienen confianza y lo recomiendan.

Fernando está muy agradecido con los prestamistas Kiva ya que es la segunda vez que le brindan su gran apoyo ya que en esta oportunidad podrá comprar madera para su trabajo ya que actualmente tiene que alquilarla para armar los bloques, soportes y otras estructuras, y realizar mejoras en las paredes de su vivienda de esta manera podrá mejorar sus ingresos así seguirá trabajando para cumplir su gran sueño:” Darle una buena educación a sus hijos”.
texts.en:
Fernando lives in the city of Camaná, known for its agriculture, especially the cultivation of rice that's well known internationally.  It's also known for its beautiful beaches and the generosity of its inhabitants.

He's the father of two children, ages 5 and 8, whom he loves a lot and for whom he makes a big effort so they can get ahead and have a happy life without deprivation.  In his free time he likes to play soccer with his neighbors as well as eat one of his favorite foods, a delicious bean dish.

Fernando works with great effort in his business as a master builder.  He works around 12 hours a day, but it depends on the size of the building he's doing.  He believes it's going well for him in his business because he's very responsible and honest with the customers, so they trust him and recommend him.

Fernando is very grateful to the Kiva lenders because this is the second time they've given him their help.  This time he'll be able to buy wood for his job, because currently he has to rent it to assemble blocks, columns and other structures, and make improvements to the walls of his house.

This way he'll be able to improve his income and he'll continue working to realize his big dream: "To give his children a good education."

loans.use: to buy wood and to improve his house

loans.name: Mirella Yvone

texts.es:
Mirella es una mujer de 33 años, vive en la ciudad de Chincha con su hijo, a quien ama y es su principal razón en la vida, ella es una persona muy amable, trabajador y entusiasta, que dedica todos sus esfuerzos por sacar adelante a su hijo, ya que ella es madre y padre para él; lamentablemente por falta de recursos económicos y por la necesidad de trabajar desde muy joven, Mirella no pudo estudiar la carrera profesional de Derecho, pero le hubiera gustado mucho poder hacerlo, en sus ratos libres le gusta ver películas y en algunas ocasiones cocina una riquísima Carapulcra para compartir con su familia.
Por iniciativa propia, con mucho empeño y dedicación, Mirella trabaja en su pequeño negocio de venta de comida y bebidas, ella trabaja todos los días desde tempranas horas de la mañana y puede hacerlo por un aproximado de 8 horas, ella se siente a gusto realizando su labor y cree que le va bien por su buena sazón y por el trato amable que brinda a sus clientes.
Mirella se encuentra muy agradecida con los prestamistas Kiva, ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada podrá realizar la compra de andamios, exhibidores e insumos, los cuales le servirán de mucho para acondicionar su negocio, así pues ella seguirá trabajando y esforzándose para lograr su gran sueño de tener su casa propia.
texts.en:
Mirella is a 33 year old woman. She lives in the city of Chincha with her son, whom she loves and who is her main reason for living. She is a very kind, hardworking and enthusiastic person who puts all of her effort into getting her son ahead, because she is both mother and father to him. Unfortunately, due to a lack of financial resources and because she has had to wrk since she was very young, Mirella was unable to study law, but she would have really liked to. In her free time, she likes to see movies and on occasion cook a delicious carapulcra to share with her family.

On her own initiative, with much hard work and dedication, Mirella works at her own business selling food and beverages. She works every day starting in the early morning hours. She can work for approximately 8 hours. She is happy with her work and believes that it is going well for her because she is a good cook and because she is friendly to her customers.

Mirella is grateful to the Kiva lenders, since thanks to their help she will be able to buy shelving, display cases and materials. These will be very useful for improving her business, because she will keep working and striving to achieve her biggest dream of having her own home.

loans.use: to buy some shelving, display cases and materials

loans.name: Faustina

texts.es: Faustina es una Señora luchadora, ella desea poder ver su casa en mejores condiciones, por lo que pide un préstamo por quinientos mil colones (500.000) para comprar materiales para reparar su vivienda entre ellos pintura y cielorazo. Como meta espera poder tener su casa terminada y bien reparada para poder vivir mas cómodamente con su familia.
texts.en: Faustina is a fighting woman. She wants to be able to see her home in better condition, for which she is requesting loan for five hundred thousand colones (500,000) to purchase materials to repair her home, such as painting and installing ceilings. As her goal, she hopes to be able to have her house finished and well repaired in order to be able to live more comfortably with her family.

loans.use: repair her home

loans.name: Edith

texts.es: Edith es una señora viuda que desde joven ha sido comerciante. Ella ha decidido poner su propio negocio para poder obtener ingresos para su hogar. Necesita de un préstamo por un millón de colones (1.000.000) para poder comprar la mercadería necesaria para surtir la tienda de abarrotes. Con esto pretende darle lo necesario a sus hijos y así poder darles un mejor bienestar familiar.
texts.en: Edith is a widow who has been a merchant she was young. She decided to open her own business to have income for her home. She needs a loan of a million colones (1.000.000) so she can buy merchandise she needs to stock her grocery store. With this she intends on giving her children what they need to give them more family well being.

loans.use: to buy merchandise to stock her grocery store.

loans.name: Jesus Alexander

texts.es:
Jesus es un joven de 27 años de edad, vive al llado de su esposa y su pequeño hijo a quien quiere muchísimo y se esfuerza por darle una vida digna y ofrecerle las oportunidades que él no tuvo. La vivienda donde habita Jesus se encuentra en la ciudad de Ica, ciudad caracterizada por su clima cálido, y su agricultura, en especial el cultivo de algodón, uva, esparrago, entre otros. Como buen peruano a Jesus le gusta la comida, por ello su plato favorito es el riquísimo Arroz con Pollo, Jesus estudio hasta el quinto grado de educación secundaria, pero le hubiera gustado estudiar Ingeniería Mecánica.

Día a día Jesus trabaja como chofer de taxi, el se dedica a su trabajo alrededor de 8 horas diarias y puede atender hasta 20 clientes por día; él cree que le va bien en su trabajo porque es responsable cuando conduce y es amable con los clientes.

Jesus está muy agradecido con los prestamistas Kiva ya que gracias a la ayuda que le han brindado el podrá construir un cuarto, ya que actualmente vive en un ambiente inadecuado y sobre todo que su pequeño en temporada de invierno se enferma mucho, con esta mejora podrá brindarle una mejor calidad de vida y sobre todo seguridad para su familia; Jesus seguirá trabajando muy duro porque quiere cumplir uno de sus más grandes sueños: “Darle una buena educación a su hijo y ser Tener su casa propia”.
texts.en:
Jesus is a 27 year old young man. He lives with his wife and young son, whom he loves very much. He works hard to give him the opportunities he didn't have. The house where Jesus lives is located in the city of Ica, a city characterized by its warm climate, its farming, and especially cotton, grape, asparagus and more. As a good Peruvian, Jesus likes food. His favorite dish is the delicious arroz con pollo. Jesus  went to school up to the fifth year of secondary school, but he would have liked to study mechanical engineering. 

Day to day, Jesus works as a taxi driver. He works around 8 hours a day and can serve up to 20 customers a day. He believes that it is going well for him in his job because he is responsible when he drives and friendly to his customers.

Jesus is very grateful to the Kiva lenders, since thanks to their help he will be able to build a room. Right now, he lives in inadequate surroundings. More than anything, during winter his little one gets sick a lot. With this, he will be able to offer him a better quality of life and above all have safety for his family.      Jesus will keep working very hard because he wants to make one of his biggest dreams come true: give his son a good education and own his own home.

loans.use: to build a room

loans.name: Cristhian Hipolito

texts.es:
Cristhian es un joven de 24 años de edad, vive al lado de sus padres quienes se dedican a la agricultura y por quienes ha aprendido sobre el trabajo, la honradez y sobre todo la humildad y por quienes se sienten muy orgulloso ya que a pesar de su humildad siempre le han dado buenas enseñanzas. Su vivienda se ubica en la ciudad de imperial, ciudad que se caracteriza por tener un clima cálido y acogedor, asimismo se desarrolla la agricultura en especial los cultivos de algodón, maíz, plátano, entre otros. Cristhian anteriormente trabajaba junto a sus padres en los campos de cultivo, pero un tiempo después ingreso a un fundo, en el cual se siembran árboles para la venta de las cosechas en los mercados de la ciudad,  lleva trabajando en este fundo desde hace ya 4 años, en los cuales diariamente trabaja alrededor de 9 horas.  El cree que le va bien en su trabajo ya que es muy responsable y sobre todo porque tiene mucho conocimiento.

Cristhian está muy agradecido con los prestamistas Kiva ya que es la segunda vez que le brindan su valiosa ayuda el podrá colocar una base de cemento al piso de la vivienda donde habita actualmente ya  solo es de tierra; de esta manera mejorara su calidad de vida  y seguirá luchando para hacer realidad su más grande sueño:” Darle una buena calidad de vida a sus padres y tener un negocio propio”.
texts.en:
Cristhian is a 24 year old young man who lives with his parents, who are farmers. He learned about work, honesty and above all humility from them. He is very proud of them because despite their humility, they have always taught him well.  His home is located in the city of Imperial, a city characterized by having a warm and pleasing climate. He also works in agriculture, especially growing cotton, corn, plantains and more. Cristhian used to work with his parents in the fields, but later started to work for a farm where they grow trees to sell in the city markets. He has been working at that farm for 4 years and works around 9 hours a day. He thinks it is going well for him because he is responsible and above all because he has a lot of knowledge.

Cristhian is very grateful to the Kiva lenders, since this is the second time that they have given their valuable help, he will be able to put in a cement floor in his house where he lives now. This way, he will improve his quality and keep fighting to make his biggest dream come true: give his parents a good quality of life and have his own business.

loans.use: to put in a cement floor.

loans.name: Alimatou

texts.fr:
Madame Alimatou habite derrière l’IMCEC. Elle est mariée et mère de 3 enfants. Elle évolue dans le commerce depuis 3 ans, elle a ouvert sa propre boutique d’alimentation générale avec ses moyens propres. Elle ouvre de 10h du matin à 00h. Avec le crédit, elle compte renforcer son fond de commerce afin de générer plus de bénéfices. Et grâce à ce dernier, elle épargne régulièrement, chose qu’elle ne réussissait pas à faire.
Elle a comme ambition d’agrandir son espace et de devenir une grande commerçante dans la localité ou elle habite.
texts.en:
Mrs. Alimatou lives behind the IMCEC office. She is married and has three children. She has been active in retail commerce for the past three years, and opened her own grocery store using her own resources. She opens from 10 am to midnight.

She intends to use the loan to strengthen her business and generate more profits. Because of them, she now saves on a regular basis, which she was unable to do before. Her ambition is to expand her workspace and become a large retail merchant in the town where she lives.

loans.use: buy grocery items for her store (oil, sugar, milk, soap ...)

loans.name: Qurbonshoh

texts.ru: Курбоншох 34 года. Он с женой и тремя детьми проживает в городе Дангара. Курбоншох предприимчивый и трудолюбивый человек. Вот уже 10 лет как он занимается животноводством. Он покупает коров и телят, откармливает их и затем продает с наценкой. Курбоншох запрашивает кредит для купли продажи крупно-рогатого скота с целью расширения своего бизнеса.
texts.en:
Qurbonshoh is 34 years old. He, his wife, and three children reside in the town of Dangara. 

Qurbonshoh is an enterprising and industrious person. For ten years already, he has been engaged in raising livestock. He buys cows and calves, fattens them, and then sells them at a premium. 

Qurbonshoh is requesting a loan to purchase cattle in order to expand his business.

loans.use: to purchase cattle to expand his activities

loans.name: Bassirou

texts.fr:
Monsieur  Bassirou jeune célibataire, s’active dans le commerce depuis 10 ans. Il a loué un magasin à la gare routière ou il vend des pièces détachées. Il travaille de 9h à 19h. Il sollicite un prêt de 500000FCFA pour renforcer son activité afin d’avoir plus de bénéfices pour pouvoir faire face à ses charges locatives et alimentaires.
Pour diversifier son activité et maximiser son profit, il désire entrer dans le transport.
texts.en:
Mr. Bassirou is a young bachelor who has been active in retail commerce over the past ten years. He rented a shop at the bus station where he sells spare parts. He works from 9am to 7pm.

He is requesting a loan of 500,000 FCFA to bolster his business activity and increase profits so he can manage his rental and food expenses.
To diversify his business and maximize his profits, he wants to move into the transportation business.

loans.use: buy spare parts to resell

loans.name: Ibrahima

texts.fr:
Monsieur Ibrahima fait du maraichage depuis quelque temps seulement. Parallèlement il fait de l’embouche et cela, il ya a 3 ans et tous les prêts consentis, il les a investit dans cette activité. Ibrahima est célibataire et vit avec ses parents. C’est lui qui s’occupe des factures et participe à la dépense quotidienne. Désormais, il peut épargner et améliorer les conditions alimentaires de la famille grâce aux financements reçus. 
Il rêve de devenir un grand investisseur et d’avoir son propre verger.
texts.en: Mr. Ibrahima has been working in market gardening for only a little while. At the same time, he has been raising livestock for three years. All of his loans were invested in this business. Ibrahima is unmarried and lives with his parents. He is the one who takes care of the bills and helps to cover day-to-day expenses. He can now save money and improve his family's food situation, thanks to the loans gotten. He dreams of becoming a major investor and having his own orchard.

loans.use: to purchase livestock to raise and resell

loans.name: Fathiddin

texts.ru: Фатхиддин проживает в районе Темурмалик. Ему  40 лет. Он женат и отец троих детей. Фатхиддин единственный кормилец в семье. Он обеспечиват семью за счет прибыли с купли продажи крупно-рогатого скота. Фатхиддин занимается животноводческой деятельностью более 7 лет и является опытным скотоводом. Дополнительно Фатхиддин работает плотником. Сейчас Фатхиддин намерен расширить свой бизнес и с этой целью он берет кредит для закупа крупно-рогатого скота с дальнейшим его откормом и перепродажи.
texts.en:
Fathiddin resides in the region of Temurmalik. He is 40 years old. He is married and the father of three children. Fathiddin is the sole breadwinner for the family. He provides for the family with the profits from the purchase and sale of cattle. Fathiddin has been engaged in livestock activities for more than seven years and is an experienced rancher. Additionally, Fathiddin works as a carpenter. 

Now, Fathiddin intends to expand his business and to this end is taking a loan for the purchase of cattle for further fattening and resale.

loans.use: to buy and sell cattle with the aim of expanding his business

loans.name: Kenja

texts.ru: Кенча житель города Куляба. Ему 68 лет. Женат, имеет двоих детей. Кенча занимается животноводством в течение двадцати лет и является опытным скотоводом. Он покупает коров и телят, откармливает их, и продает с наценкой на рынке своего города. В его деле помогает ему жена и сыновья. Чтобы расширить бизнес и получить хорошую прибыль, Кенча запрашивает кредит для купли и продажи скота.
texts.en:
Kenja is resident of the town of Kulob. He is 68 years old. He is married and has two children. 

Kenja has been engaged in raising livestock over the course of twenty years and is an experienced rancher. He buys cows and calves, fattens them up, and sells them at a premium in the town market. His wife and sons help in his work. 

To expand the business and make a good profit, Kenja is requesting a loan to buy and sell livestock.

loans.use: to buy and sell livestock

loans.name: Omar

texts.fr:
Monsieur Omar marié et père de cinq enfants, est agent de sécurité au ciment du Sahel, une entreprise de la place. Il a une expérience de 10 ans dans ce domaine. Il monte à 7h pour descendre à 17h.
  Il vient solliciter un crédit pour que son fils puisse subir une opération des yeux. Omar est à son 5ème prêt et il a toujours respecté ses engagements. Le prêt lui aura permis de remplir son rôle de responsable et de protecteur envers sa famille pour leur bien-être. Il rêve de devenir un grand transporteur un jour et de construire sa maison.
texts.en:
Mr. Omar is married and the father of five children. He is a security guard at Ciment du Sahel, a local enterprise. He has ten years of experience in this domain. He is on duty at 7:00 AM and off duty at 5:00 PM. 

He is here to request a loan, so that his son may undergo an eye operation. Omar is on his fifth loan. He has always respected his obligations. The loan will have enabled him to fulfill his role as the head of household and protector of his family's well-being. He dreams of becoming a major transporter one day and to build his house.

loans.use: to pay the medical fees her his ill son

loans.name: Maty

texts.fr: Madame Maty est mariée et mère de 4 enfants, elle s’active dans le commerce depuis 3 ans et depuis lors, grâce aux bénéfices, elle aide son mari dans les dépenses quotidiennes de la famille et c’est elle qui gère aussi la scolarité des enfants. Avec le  crédit, elle va pouvoir  aller en Gambie pour acheter des tissus et les revendre. Puisse qu’elle est encore à ses débuts elle fait l’ambulant, seulement, elle aimerait dans l’avenir ouvrir sa propre cantine pour pouvoir  stocker ses marchandises.
texts.en:
Mrs. Maty is married and has four children. She has been active in retail business for the past three years. Since then, thanks to the profits, she helps her husband with the family's daily expenditures and also takes care of the children's tuition.

Her credit loan will enable her to go to Gambia to buy and sell fabrics. As her business is still in its infancy she operates as a street vendor. In the future she would like to open her own stall where she can store her wares.

loans.use: buy clothing fabrics for retail sales

loans.name: Doufi's Group

texts.fr:
Ce groupe a été crée depuis le le 28/05/2009. Il est composé de 23 femmes d'un même quartier unies par de bonnes relations sociales et professionnelles.
Le responsable madame Fatou est debout à l’extrême droite de la photo habillée d'un grand boubou bleu ciel recouvert d'un écharpe jaune.
Elle s'active dans le commerce de produits de merceries depuis longtemps et dispose d'une bonne expérience.
Avec son crédit de 50000 francs cfa elle va acheter des files en couleurs et des boutons et garnitures qu'elle va revendre au détail au niveau du quartier.
Les bénéfices réalisés par son activité lui permettent de prendre en charge les besoins alimentaires, scolaires et sanitaires de ses enfants .
texts.en:
This group was created on May 28, 2009. It comprises 23 women from the same district who are united by good social and professional ties. The official, Ms. Fatou, is the one standing at the far right in the photo; she is dressed in a formal sky-blue 'boubou' and covered with a yellow scarf. She has been active in the commerce of sewing supplies for a long time and has good experience. 

With her loan of 50,000 francs CFA, she is going to purchase colored thread and some buttons and trim that she will sell retail in the district. 

The profits earned by her business enable her to meet her children's food, schooling, and healthcare needs.

loans.use: to purchase sewing supplies for running a small-scale revenue-generating business

loans.name: El Renacer De Chacrasana Group

texts.es: El grupo “El Renacer De Chacrasana” está conformado por 07 mujeres emprendedoras que tienen como propósito seguir mejorando cada día. Este es el caso de Elba, que con su trabajo ha podido apoyar con los gastos del hogar.  Actualmente cuenta con una librería bazar, nos comenta que le va bien a pesar de la competencia ha logrado incrementar  sus clientes. Se siente feliz y agradece a los prestamistas Kiva por la ayuda brindada.  Solicitó el crédito para la compra cuadernos, lapiceros, fólderes entre otros útiles por campaña escolar. Elba tiene 57 años de edad casada con 03 hijos independientes.  Seguir mejorando su negocio es su mayor deseo. Elba se encuentra sentada, es la primera del lado derecho y viste polo negro.
texts.en:
The group “El Renacer De Chacrasana" is made up of 7 entrepreneurial women whom have as intention to continue improving every day. 

This is Elbas's case,with her work she has been able to help with the household expenses. At present, she has a book and stationery store, and she tells us that it is going well. In spite of the competition, she has managed to increase customer numbers. She feels happy and is thankful to Kiva lenders for their help. 

She asked for the loan to purchase notebooks, pencils, folders among other supplies for scholastic year. Elba is 57 years old, married with 3 independent children. Continuing to improve her business is her greatest desire. Elba is seated on the left in the front row, dressed in a black sweater.

loans.use: to purchase notebooks, pencils, folders.

loans.name: Juan

texts.es: Hola, desde Perú. Les presento a  un joven  universitario con muchos deseos de superación. Juan de 26 años de edad soltero y sin hijos, es un agradable estudiante de mecánica automotriz que sacrifica mucho tiempo en sus estudios para poder  logras sus metas en la vida,  ya que también eventualmente trabaja como mecánico en un pequeño taller y a si poder tener algunos ingresos económicos extras. Juan tiene la meta de culminar sus estudios con éxitos y poder ser un buen ingeniero mecánico. Con el préstamo otorgado el podrá realizar los pagos de su matrícula universitaria y la compra de útiles de estudio que necesita. Juan se encuentra muy agradecido  por la ayuda brindada y se despide con un fuerte abrazo para todos y con la promesa del cumplimiento de sus metas.
texts.en:
Hello from Peru. Juan is a college student who wants to succeed. He is 26, single, and does not have children. He is studying auto mechanics and has dedicated a lot of time to his studies so that he can achieve his goals. He works as a mechanic in a small shop to earn extra income. 

Juan's goals are to finish his studies and be a mechanical engineer. This loan will allow him to pay college fees and buy the supplies he needs. He is grateful for the support and says good-bye with a big hug for all and a promise to achieve his goals.

loans.use: to pay fees and buy school supplies.

loans.name: Emprendedoras Del Valle El Triunfo Group

texts.es: Hola  con un  cordial saludo  de Perú,  les presento a un grupo conformado por 8 mujeres emprendedoras  y con mucha creatividad para los negocios. Así son las integrantes del grupo comunal “Emprendedoras del Valle el Triunfo”. Una de ellas es la Sra. Gumercinda de 43 años de edad soltera y madre de 3 hijos, la Sra. Gumercinda es una mujer muy emprendedora que debido  de sus esfuerzos a sabido superarse, la Sra. Gumercinda vende medicinas naturales en un pequeño local en su casa, el cual es su única fuente de ingresos para ella y su familia.  Con el préstamo otorgado lo invertirá en compras de productos naturales para su posterior venta y a si también poder  apoyar a sus hijos para que concluyan sus estudios. La Sra. Gumercinda se encuentra muy agradecida por la ayuda brinda, se despide con con un fuerte abraso sabiendo que cumplirá todas sus metas.
texts.en: Hello, greetings from Peru. I introduce you to a group made up of 8 enterprising women who are very creative in their businesses. They are the members of the communal bank called “Emprendedoras del Valle el Triunfo”. One of them is Gumercinda. She is 43 years old, single and the mother of 3 children. Gumercinda is a very enterprising woman, who from her efforts has been able to get ahead. Gumercinda sells natural medicines at a small locale in her house. It is the only source of income,for her and her family. With the loan she will invest in buying natural products to later sell and be able to support her children so they can finish their studies. Gumercinda is very grateful for the help that has been given. She takes her leave with a big hug, knowing that she will accomplish all of her goals.

loans.use: to invest in buying natural products.

loans.name: And Dégo De Birbirane Group

texts.fr: Elles sont au nombre de cinq et se sont regroupées en un groupe de crédit pour bénéficier des services de l’IMCEC.  Elles se  sont nommées : And Dégo de Birbirane. Elles s’activent dans le commerce. Leur présidente madame Rama, vend des tissus, des draps de lit depuis 15 ans maintenant. Elle passe toute sa journée vouée à son activité. Elle participe à la dépense quotidienne et gère la scolarité de ses enfants. Grace au crédit, elle peut diversifier les produits et services comme les fruits de mer. Elle pourra aussi améliorer les conditions alimentaires de son foyer.
texts.en: This group has 5 members who are grouped together in a loan group so that they can benefit from the services of UIMCEC. They are called And Dégo De Birbirane. The group members are retailers. The group leader, Rama, has been selling fabrics and bedsheets for 15 years. She spends all her days devoted to her business. She contributes to the daily expenses and manages her children's education needs. Thanks to the loan, she can diversify her products and services, for instance by selling seafood. She will also be able to improve her household's nutrition.

loans.use: to buy fabrics and bedsheets for resale.

loans.name: And Joubo De Birbirane Group

texts.fr:
And Joubo de Birbirane est composé de cinq femmes qui se sont associées en groupe pour pouvoir bénéficier de crédit. Elles s’activent toute dans le commerce et cela depuis longtemps.
Madame Khady qui fait de la vente d’ustensiles de cuisine, est une brave femme qui a démarré l’activité depuis 2006. Elle procède ainsi : elle donne la marchandise à crédit et elle passe journalière ment pour récupérer  l’argent. Avec les bénéfices de son activité, elle règle la scolarité de ces enfants et participe à la dépense quotidienne. Elle veut diversifier son activité en vendant du pain de singe, des arachides et des céréales.
texts.en: The And Joubo de Birbirane group is made up of 5 women who have formed a group so that they can benefit from credit. They are all retailers and have been for a long time. Khady, who sells kitchen utensils, is a courageous woman who started her business in 2006. She conducts her business by selling on credit and dropping by on a daily basis to get the money due. She takes care of her children's education and contributes to the daily expenses with the profits generated by her business. She would like to diversify her business and sell monkey bread, groundnuts and cereals.`

loans.use: to buy kitchen utensils for resale.

loans.name: Astrid

texts.es: Saludos desde Perú, la señorita Astrid es una joven universitaria  con muchos deseos de superación y con ganas de salir adelante. Astrid  de 22 años de edad ,  soltera y sin hijos, es una agradable estudiante de la facultad de derecho que estudia mucho para alcanzar sus sueños  en la vida. Astrid  tiene la meta de culminar sus estudios con éxitos y poder ser una buena abogada  en derecho. Con el préstamo otorgado lo invertirá  para el pago de sus pensiones universitarias  y  realizar la compra  de útiles de estudio que necesita. Astrid  se encuentra muy agradecido  por la ayuda brindada y se despide con muchos deseos de culminar sus metas propuestas.
texts.en:
Greetings from Peru. Astrid is a young university student with a desire to come out ahead. Astrid, 22, single and without children, is a pleasant Law student. She studies a lot to reach her dreams in life. Astrid's goal is to complete her studies with success and to be a good lawyer. 
With the loan offered she will invest it for the payment of university boarding and to purchase study supplies needed. Astrid is very thankful for the help offered and she takes leave with many wishes to fulfill her proposed goals.

loans.use: to pay for university boarding.

loans.name: Paxoj 2 Group

texts.es:
La señora Magdalena esta soltera, tiene 33 años de edad,cursó los 3 años de educación primaria, se dedica al tricotado y tejido de cortes típicos, inicio este trabajo haciendo un préstamo con sus amigos, hasta el momento lleva 18 años de experiencia, lo cual le ha ido bien.

Organiza un grupo para solicitar un préstamo que lo utilizara para la compra de hilos y tinta para tricotado hilos y tejido de cortes típicos, ya que quiere que su negocio crezca y tenga en el futuro varios trabajadores tejiendo blusas de la región donde vive. Las demás integrantes se dedican a la venta de maíz, tejeduría, crianza y venta de animales.
texts.en:
Magdalena is single, she is 33 years old, and completed the three years of primary school. She makes her living knitting and weaving traditional fabrics. She started this work through a loan with her friends, to date she has 18 years of experience, and it has been going well for her.

Magdalena leads a group to request a loan which she will use to buy yarn and dyes for knitting, and yarns and fabric for traditional clothes as she wants her business to grow and have several employees in the future, sewing blouses from the region in which she lives. The remaining members make their living selling corn, sewing, rearing and selling animals.

loans.use: to buy supplies for weaving.

loans.name: Nelson

texts.es: Don Nelson es un padre de familia muy trabajador. El necesita de un préstamo de novecientos mil colones (900.000) para comprar materiales de construcción como cemento y arena para terminar su vivienda. Esto le ayudará a tener una vivienda digna y segura para su familia, y así poder seguir creciendo personalmente y que se familia pueda salir adelante
texts.en: Nelson is a very hardworking family man. He needs a loan of 900,000 Costa Rican colones to buy construction materials such as cement and sand to finish his home. This will help him to have a dignified and secure home for his family, and therein be able to continue to grow personally and so that his family gets ahead.

loans.use: to buy construction materials.

loans.name: And Disso De Birbirane Group

texts.fr:
And Disso regroupe cinq femmes qui habitent dans un petit village situé aux environs de la ville principale. Madame Astou est leur tête de liste, elle s’active dans la vente de fruits de mer. Elle a une expérience de 3 ans dans ce domaine. Elle sollicite ce crédit pour acheter du poisson séché et fumé, des variétés de fruits de mer qui entrent dans la préparation du plat le plus apprécié : la soupe au gombo ; ce qui fait que ses produits ne suffisent même pas, la demande est plus forte que l’offre.
Astou n’a pas de charges qui l’encombrent. Elle aimerait un peu après, y associer la vente de poisson qui est aussi demandé par les populations.
texts.en: And Disso groups together 5 women who live in a small village located in the neighbourhood of the main town. Astou is their leader and sells seafood. She has 3 years experience in this line of work. She is requesting this loan to buy dried and smoked fish, and a variety of seafood which is part of the most popular local dish; gumbo soup. She has not got enough inventory as demand is stronger than supply. Astou is not burdened by any debt. She would like to eventually sell fish which is also popular with the inhabitants.

loans.use: to buy seafood and dried fish for resale.

loans.name: Melvin

texts.es: Melvin es un agricultor muy esforzado. Siempre ha tenido como meta el poder tener mas productos para la cosecha, por lo que solicita un préstamo de trecientos cincuenta mil colones (350.000) para compra mas materiales para sembrar plátano. Con este préstamo le ayudará a tener una mejor solvencia económica y poder darle una mejor calidad de vida a su familia.
texts.en: Melvin is a determined farmer. His goal has always been to increase the productivity of his harvests. To do that, Melvin is rerquesting a loan of 350,000 colones to purchase more supplies for planting plantains. This loan will help him achieve greater economic solvency and provide a higher standard of living for his family.

loans.use: purchase needed supplies for planting plantains.

loans.name: Mi Niño Jesus Iv Programa Group

texts.es: Hola desde Perú,les presento a un grupo conformado por 5  personas  emprendedoras  y con mucha creatividad para los    negocios. Así son las integrantes del grupo comunal “ mi niño Jesús  de IV programa ” una de ellas es la Sra. Jacqueline de 32 años de edad es una señora muy empeñosa, y  trabaja vendiendo ropa ya que tiene un pequeño local de venta de ropa   en su casa y así poder darle una mejor calidad de vida a sus dos hijos. con el resiente prestamos lo invertirá en prendas de vestir como camisas y blusas para su posterior venta.  la Sra. Jacqueline se siente contenta  con el préstamo otorgado y agradecida con Kiva y Edaprospo por la confianza brindada  con un cordial saludo se despide, sabiendo  que cumplirá todos sus metas.
texts.en:
Hello from Peru! May I introduce you to a group made up of five enterprising people with plenty of creativity for business: the members of the "Mi Niño Jesús de IV Programa" communal bank. 

One of the members is Jacqueline, 32, a very persevering woman who makes a living selling clothing. She has a small area for selling clothes in her house. This business allows her to give her two children a better quality of life. 

She will invest this loan in articles of clothing, such as shirts and blouses, which she will then sell. Jacqueline is happy with this loan and grateful to Kiva and Edaprospo for their trust in her. 

With kind regards, she says goodbye, knowing that she will accomplish all of her goals.

loans.use: to buy clothing.

loans.name: Superacion 1 Group

texts.es:
La señora Catalina Lucrecia esta casada, tiene 34 años de edad, cursó los 6 años de educación primaria, tiene   3 hijos quienes están estudiando, se dedica al bordados de guipiles, blusas y delantales, trabajo que inicio gracias al apoyo de un familiar haciendo un préstamo, hasta el momento lleva 8 años de experiencia, cuenta con el apoyo de su esposo quien se dedica a la albañilería.

organiza un grupo y solicita un préstamo que lo utilizara para la compra de telas típicas para delantal, y si poder tener grade producción de delantales bordados, esperando en el futuro tener una gran maquila. Los demás integrantes se dedican al bordado, venta de helados, crianza de animales.
texts.en:
Catalina Lucrecia is married. She is 34 years old and has 6 years of primary education. She has 3 children who are in school. She embroiders guipiles, blouses and aprons. She started this work thanks to the support of a family member who made a loan. So far, she has 8 years experience. She has her husband's help; he is a bricklayer. 

She organizes a group and and is asking for a loan she will use to buy traditional fabrics for aprons. She will be able to have more production of embroidered aprons. She hopes in the future to have a great production company. The other members do embroidery, sell ice cream and raise animals.

loans.use: to buy fabric to embroider aprons.

loans.name: Solidaridad De Jicamarca Group

texts.es: Hola desde  Perú, les presento a un grupo conformado por 7  personas  emprendedoras  y con mucha creatividad para los negocios. Así son los integrantes del grupo comunal “solidaridad de jicamarca” una de ellas es la Sra. Eugenia de 53 años de edad y madre un hijo el cual e su motivo de lucha constante.  la Sra. Eugenia es muy trabajadora y con grandes deseos de superación. la Sra. Eugenia es una maestra jubilada que desde muy temprano se dedica a la atención en su pequeña bodega que tiene en su casa y eventualmente realiza servicios de costura.con  el préstamo otorgado realizara compras para suministrar de abarrotes y verduras para su bodega  y a si poder mejorar su calidad de vida.  en el futuro le gustaría ampliar su bodega y a si poder tener mayores ingresos económicos. la Sra. Eugenia se despide muy agradecida con kiva y Edaprospo por la ayuda brindada y la confianza depositada en ella.
texts.en: Greetings from Peru! We present to you a group of 7 entrepreneurial people who have a lot of creativity regarding business. They are the members of the community group "Solidarity of Jicamarca." One of the members is Eugenia who is 53 years old and the mother of a son who is her motivation for constant struggle. Eugenia is a hard worker and she has a great desire to get ahead. Eugenia is a retired teacher who, starting very early in the morning, attends to her little bodega that she has in her house and later she performs sewing services. With the loan she has been granted she will complete purchases of supplies of groceries and vegetables for her bodega and through this she will be able to improve her quality of life. In the future she would like to enlarge her bodega to obtain better earnings. Eugenia is very grateful to Kiva and Edaprospo for the help they have given her and the confidence they have instilled in her.

loans.use: to buy groceries and vegetables.

loans.name: Nuevo Amanecer Group

texts.es: Saludos  desde Perú,   les presento a un grupo conformado por 7  personas emprendedoras    y con mucha creatividad para los negocios. Así son los integrantes del grupo comunal “NUEVO AMANECER” una de ellas es la Sra. Lorenza de 48 años de edad soltera y madre de  4 hijos, ella se dedica diariamente a la venta de ropa,  el cual le ha generado ganancias para poder cubrir los gastos de educación de sus hijos,  En el futuro le gustaría tener un local propio donde poder vender sus productos y obtener mayores ganancias económicas. Con el préstamo otorgado lo invertirá  en una  línea de ropa tanto para hombre como para mujer. A la vez  la Sra. Lorenza y todos los integrantes se encuentran  agradecidos   con Kiva y Edaprospo por el préstamo otorgado    y por la confianza que se  les ha sido brindada. Se despide  Dejando la promesa  que cumplirá todas sus metas propuestas.
texts.en: Greetings from Peru! We present to you a group of 7 entrepreneurs with lots of business creativity. These are the members of the community group "New Dawn." One of the members is Lorenza who is 48 years old, single and the mother of 4 children. She works every day selling clothing. This activity has generated earnings that cover the education expenses of her children. In the future she would like to have her own store where she can sell her products and obtain larger earnings. With the loan she has been granted she will invest it in a line of clothes that is equally for men and women. Together Lorenza and all of the members are grateful to Kiva and Edaprospo for granting them the loan and for the confidence they have instilled in them. She left us with the promise that she will complete all of her scheduled payments.

loans.use: to buy clothing.

loans.name: Los Vicentes 2 Group

texts.es:
El señor Paulo Vidal es soltero, tiene 56 años de edad, curso el 3 año de educación primaria, se dedica a la crianza y venta de animales, específicamente domésticos como cerdos, aves de corral, inicio su negocio con 5 cerdos que le regalo su señor padre, hasta el momento lleva 14 años de experiencia. 

Organiza un grupo y solicita un préstamo que lo utilizara para la compra de de 6 cerdos, y afrechillo para la alimentación de los mismos, ya que quiere tener mas animales y ene el futuro contar con 4 corrales. Los demás integrantes del grupo se dedican a la crianza de animales, a la venta de semillas de ajonjolí y a la venta de maíz.
texts.en:
Paulo Vidal is single and 56 years old. He studied up to the third year of primary school. He makes a living raising and selling animals, specifically domesticated animals such as pigs and poultry. He started his business with five pigs which his father gave to him. He now has fourteen years of experience.

He has organized a group and applied for a loan, which he will use to buy six pigs and bran to feed them. In the future, he would like to have more animals and four corrals. The other members of the group make a living raising animals, selling sesame seeds, and selling corn.

loans.use: to buy pigs.

loans.name: Ande Suxali Birbirane Group

texts.fr: And Sukali Birbirane est un groupe de crédit qui est composé de cinq membres qui évoluent dans le commerce. Elle est l’ainé du groupe et fait office de présidente, elle s’appelle Nogaye et  évolue dans la vente d’huile de palme, de poisson séché, arachide, et huile artisanale. Elle a une expérience de 2 ans. Il faut dire que grâce au crédit, elle pourra se charger dorénavant de la scolarité des enfants puisse qu’elle pourra avoir un fond de commerce qui lui permettra de ne pas être en rupture et de générer régulièrement  un bénéfice.
texts.en: And Sukali Birbirane is a loan group consisting of 5 members who are all retailers. Nogaye is the group elder and holds the position of group president. She sells palm oil, dried fish, groundnuts and home-made oil.  She has 2 years experience in this line of work. From now on, thanks to this loan, she will be able to make sure her children get an education, as she will have funds allowing her to avoid stock shortages and make a steady profit.

loans.use: to buy dried and smoked fish, palm oil and groundnuts for resale.

loans.name: Pamela Ivett
